page.title: 10HOLTON AREA HEALTH
page.content: Most of the people living in the area are registered with a Doctor from one of 4 practices, 2 being at Wragby and a group practice at both Welton and Market Rasen.When necessary patients are referred to Lincoln or Louth Hospitals for in and out patient treatment. Ambulance cars or W.R.V.S. cars may help with transport problems Health care can be given at home by a variety of people including Health Visitors, District Nurses, Community Midwives and Social Workers. Doctors can be "bleeped" and many are on the "LIVES" rota.(Lincolnshire Integrated Voluntary Emergency Service). The Surgeries and Health Centres provide other services such as baby clinics, chiropody, dental care, eye clinics, physiotherapy and school medical checks.
